Name: Raven
Desc:
Temporarily summons Raven of Dark Attribute.
Raven's attacks do not cause you to take damage even when attacking enemies in the Damage Reflection Status. Also increases DEF permanently.

Desc.Old:
Temporarily summons Raven of Dark Attribute. Raven attacks up to 4 enemies at once when summoned.
Raven's attacks do not affect enemies with the Damage Reflection effect. Also increases DEF permanently.
Desc.New:
Temporarily summons Raven of Dark Attribute.
Raven's attacks do not cause you to take damage even when attacking enemies in the Damage Reflection Status. Also increases DEF permanently.

H.Old:
MP Cost: 70. Summons Raven for 220 sec. Attacks up to 4 enemies at 390% damage at once.
[Passive Effect: DEF +30%]
